context: Red Dead Redemption released to critical acclaim. Take-Two rejected hostile takeover bid from EA in 2008. Company solidified position with Rockstar and 2K labels.

competitors.name: Electronic Arts
competitors.notes: Attempted hostile takeover of Take-Two in 2008

competitors.name: Activision Blizzard
competitors.notes: Merged 2008, Call of Duty Modern Warfare dominance

competitors.name: Ubisoft
competitors.notes: Assassin's Creed franchise, major AAA publisher
